0.3.3.name: wordpress/minecraft-admin
0.3.3.description:
“Minecraft Admin for Wordpress” is a plugin for Wordpress, you can configure and manage your Minecraft/Bukkit Server with your wordpress blog.

features:

  • no Minecraft Plugin installation required
  • start/stop/restart command
  • filebrowser
  • live log view
  • no Linux knowledge required
  • backup function
  • access adjustable
  • cronjobs
  • server status and online user widget
  • online user display
  • easy of use
  • you can use it on multiblog installations
  • install more than 1 server

requirements:

  • a Linux servers you can install Minecraft (root access). Tested with Debian and Ubuntu.
